knimeNode.name: QvxReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads qvx files and produce a data table on the output port.

intro.p: Reads qvx files. Upon executing, the node will read the table header information to determine number and types of the columns and output a table containing the data from the data portion of the qvx file.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: Enter a valid file name, or select a file from the "Browse" dialog. The supported file format is .qvx.

ports.outPort: Data table, with number and types of columns determined by the input file's table header.
